title: Ticket #6300: Stray newline in job log
description:
Kevin Hrpcek wrote: 

We found a formatting error in the EventLog this week. We parse the
EventLog and the extra newline on the Message line caused our parsing
the log to fail. I've looked through the release notes for newer
versions and didn't see a fix include nor could I find an existing
ticket for it. The error was triggered by the compute node
'p-7-42.local' /var filling up. Let me know if you would like any more
information or if there is anything I can do to help. Here is a sample
of the event with the formatting issue.

...
007 (789884.359.000) 06/06 02:55:47 Shadow exception!
     Error from slot1@p-7-42.local: dprintf hit fatal errors

     0  -  Run Bytes Sent By Job
     6213  -  Run Bytes Received By Job
...
028 (789884.359.000) 06/06 02:55:47 Job ad information event triggered.
*Message = "Error from slot1@p-7-42.local: dprintf hit fatal errors**
**"*
SentBytes = 0.0
MyType = "ShadowExceptionEvent"
ReceivedBytes = 6213.0
TriggerEventTypeNumber = 7
EventTime = "2017-06-06T02:55:47"
Cluster = 789884
Proc = 359
EventTypeNumber = 28
Subproc = 0
TriggerEventTypeName = "ULOG_SHADOW_EXCEPTION"

As far as I know, we don't actually guarantee that there won't be blank lines in the job log, but seems like it should be easy to fix.
remarks:
2017-Jun-13 13:49:50 by tlmiller:
This probably doesn't need a release note. (Or a review, for that matter, but we'll try to get one anyway.)

2017-Jun-13 16:40:14 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Easy peasy.

DOC REVIEW: No docs needed.
check_ins: 2017-Jun-13 13:48   Check-in [51709]: (#6300) Remove stray newline from dprintf error message. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
